title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps last night's Astros combined no-hitter. Is a combined no-hitter an actual no hitter? MLB Network's Al Leiter calls in and tells us which team he thinks tonight is a must win for. And Fox World Series color analyst John Smoltz weighs in on the validity of a combined no-hitter.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
